data.title: Who we are
data.meta_description: Who we are, values, mission statement
data.text:
Auckland Stadiums was formed in 2012, we are the proud guardians of Mt Smart Stadium, Western Springs Stadium, and North Harbour Stadium. We are a world-class leader in live music, sports and entertainment and play a key role in providing memorable experiences and vibrancy to Tāmaki Makaurau Auckland.

We are privileged to deliver some of New Zealand’s greatest, most memorable events. We provide our communities with opportunities to establish their roots, to support their growth, which enables them to reach their own potential and experience their own extraordinary. For us, all events are equally important.

We also work collaboratively with The Trusts Arena, Vodafone Events Centre, North Shore Events Centre, Spark Arena, and the ASB Tennis Centre.

Our motto

Delivering the Extraordinary

Auckland Stadiums and Tātaki Auckland Unlimited

Auckland Stadiums is the stadium arm of Tātaki Auckland Unlimited.

Tātaki Auckland Unlimited is an Auckland Council organisation (CCO), whose aim is to enrich life in Tāmaki Makaurau Auckland by engaging people in the arts, environment, sports, and events.

Tātaki Auckland Unlimited’s portfolio also includes Auckland Art Gallery Toi o Tāmaki; Auckland Conventions, Venues and Events; Auckland Live; Auckland Zoo; and New Zealand Maritime Museum Hui Te Ananui A Tangaroa.
